itemDescription: Master Gunner, St James's Park, in the Royal Artillery

wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Robert William Gardiner  (2 May 1781 – 26 June 1864) was Master Gunner, St James's Park, the most senior Ceremonial Post in the Royal Artillery after the Sovereign.

response: |80px||12 December 1848 to 26 July 1855||Sir Robert Gardiner, Governor||
